bgibbons.game.level.tiles

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.level.tiles.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTile

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    Tile class used to set the tiles for the level.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tile

        public Tile(int id,
            boolean isSolid,
            boolean isEmitter,
            int levelColor)
        Constructor for a tile object.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer id for the tile.
        isSolid - Boolean on if the tile is solid.
        isEmitter - Boolean on if the tile is an emitter
        levelColor - Integer value of the color from the level resource to render the specific tile

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public byte getId()
        Returns the Id of the tile.
        Returns:
        The Id of the tile.

      • isSolid

        public boolean isSolid()
        Returns whether the tile is solid or not.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if solid, else otherwise.

      • isEmitter

        public boolean isEmitter()
        Returns whether the tile is an emitter or not.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if an emitter, false otherwise.

      • getLevelColor

        public int getLevelColor()
        Returns the integer value of the color from the level resource to render the specific tile.
        Returns:
        The integer value of the color from the level resource to render the specific tile.

        public abstract void tick()
        Ticks the tile.

      • render

        public abstract void render(Screen screen,
                            Level level,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Renders the tile.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to render to.
        level - Level to render from.
        x - The x coordinate to begin rendering.
        y - The y coordiante to begin rendering.
